elements.name: As an admininstrator I want to GET a list of existing topics

steps.name: I set the xaccesskey for ODA
I grab ODA port number from globalconfig.json
The response message should not include <testResponse>

elements.name: As an admininstrator I want to subscribe to a topic

steps.name: I set valid request header and body for POST call to ~/query with metadata id
I grab ODA port number from globalconfig.json
I make a POST call to ~/query
